title: Update watermark slider colors to green

requirements.summary: Change the opacity slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The opacity slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling is consistent with the site's green theme

file_operations.description: Update the opacity slider component to use green color styling by applying the 'slider-green' CSS class to the Slider component. Locate the opacity control section and add className='slider-green' to the Slider component that controls watermark opacity.

requirements.summary: Change the font size slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The font size slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling matches the opacity slider styling

file_operations.description: Update the font size slider component to use green color styling by applying the 'slider-green' CSS class to the Slider component. Locate the font size control section and add className='slider-green' to the Slider component that controls watermark font size.

requirements.summary: Change the rotation slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The rotation slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling is consistent with the other watermark sliders

file_operations.description: Update the rotation slider component to use green color styling by applying the 'slider-green' CSS class to the Slider component. Locate the rotation control section and add className='slider-green' to the Slider component that controls watermark rotation angle.
